attributes.action: require the UK Borders Agency to work constructively with the RYA and leisure industry to develop a more workable e-borders solution for recreational boaters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This issue concerns many boaters. The primary target of the programme is commercial traffic where passengers are familiar with existing controls.
The Government does not seem to have given thought to the practicalities of applying the scheme to recreational boating or whether the scheme would achieve the objectives.
Any sea border security programme should be intelligence-led rather than un-targeted monitoring of all x-border movement.
